main.label: Me
main.title: About Me
main.subtitle: A Journey Through Code, Design, and Discovery
main.description: I’m a developer with a multidisciplinary mindset, combining software engineering, AI, and design thinking to create purposeful, intelligent systems. My work is rooted in curiosity, continuous learning, and the drive to build tools that both solve real problems and inspire new ideas. This node connects the dots across everything I do — from education and skills to research and creative projects.

frontend.label: Frontend
frontend.title: Frontend Development
frontend.subtitle: Building modern, responsive user interfaces
frontend.description:
I specialize in crafting modern frontend experiences using the latest web technologies. My approach focuses on creating responsive, accessible, and performant interfaces that work across all devices.

My expertise includes modern JavaScript frameworks like React and Vue.js, along with advanced CSS techniques including animations, Grid, and Flexbox layouts. I prioritize creating semantic markup and accessible interfaces that work for all users.

design.label: Design
design.title: UI/UX Design
design.subtitle: Creating intuitive and appealing user experiences
design.description:
My design philosophy centers on creating intuitive, accessible, and aesthetically pleasing interfaces. I bridge the gap between visual design and technical implementation to ensure a cohesive user experience.

Working with tools like Figma and Adobe Creative Suite, I create design systems, prototypes, and visual assets that bring ideas to life. I'm particularly interested in creating designs that aren't just beautiful, but also practical and implementable.

backend.label: Backend
backend.title: Backend Development
backend.subtitle: Building robust server-side solutions
backend.description:
I develop scalable backend systems that power modern web applications. My focus is on creating clean, maintainable APIs and efficient database designs that support the frontend experience.

While my primary expertise is in frontend development, I'm comfortable working across the full stack, which helps me create more integrated solutions and better understand system architecture as a whole.

dataviz.label: Data Viz
dataviz.title: Data Visualization
dataviz.subtitle: Turning complex data into intuitive visual stories
dataviz.description:
I specialize in transforming complex datasets into clear, interactive visualizations that tell compelling stories. Using tools like D3.js and modern charting libraries, I create custom visualizations that help users explore and understand data intuitively.

My approach combines technical precision with design principles to ensure visualizations are not only accurate but also aesthetically pleasing and accessible to non-technical audiences.

animation.label: Animation
animation.title: Web Animation
animation.subtitle: Creating engaging motion experiences
animation.description:
I create smooth, purposeful animations that enhance user experience and bring interfaces to life. Focusing on performance and accessibility, I implement animations that guide users, provide feedback, and add delight without being distracting.

My toolkit includes CSS animations, JavaScript animation libraries, SVG animation, and WebGL for more complex 3D effects when appropriate.

masters.label: Masters Degree
masters.title: Masters in Computer Science
masters.subtitle: University of Technology, 2015-2017
masters.description:
My graduate studies focused on interactive visualization techniques and artificial intelligence applications. This multidisciplinary program combined computer science theory with practical applications in data visualization and machine learning.

My thesis project explored novel methods for visualizing neural networks for educational purposes, which led directly to my professional work in data visualization.

bachelors.label: Education
bachelors.title: Education
bachelors.subtitle: Uludag University Computer Engineering Bachelor's Degree
bachelors.description: The formal education I received in computer engineering provided me with a solid foundation in algorithms, data structures, and applied artificial intelligence, and in light of the theoretical knowledge I gained, I have developed a broader perspective in this field.

courses.label: Online Courses
courses.title: Continuous Learning
courses.subtitle: Professional development through online education
courses.description:
I believe in lifelong learning and regularly take online courses to stay current with emerging technologies and design trends.

These specialized courses have helped me deepen my expertise in areas like advanced animation techniques, data visualization, and modern frontend frameworks.

portfolio.label: Portfolio
portfolio.title: Portfolio Website
portfolio.subtitle: Personal website with interactive features
portfolio.description:
This portfolio website showcases my skills and projects through interactive elements like the mind map visualization you're currently exploring. It features a responsive design, smooth animations, and multilingual support.

Built with React, Tailwind CSS, and custom animations, this project demonstrates my approach to creating engaging and accessible web experiences.

datadashboard.label: Data Dashboard
datadashboard.title: Interactive Data Dashboard
datadashboard.subtitle: Real-time data visualization platform
datadashboard.description:
A comprehensive dashboard for visualizing and analyzing complex datasets. This application features multiple interactive visualization components, real-time data updates, and customizable views.

The dashboard demonstrates my skills in both frontend and backend development, with a focus on creating intuitive ways to explore and understand data.

visualizer.label: Audio Visualizer
visualizer.title: Interactive Audio Visualizer
visualizer.subtitle: Creative visualization of music and sound
visualizer.description:
This project transforms audio input into captivating visual displays using the Web Audio API and WebGL. Users can upload their own music or use the microphone to create unique visual patterns that respond to the audio's frequency and amplitude.

The project demonstrates my creativity and technical skills in audio processing, animation, and interactive design.

neuralnet.label: Neural Network
neuralnet.title: Neural Network Visualization
neuralnet.subtitle: Educational tool for understanding AI
neuralnet.description:
An interactive visualization tool that demystifies how neural networks learn. This project allows users to observe the learning process in real-time, with animated data flows and weight adjustments that make the abstract concepts of machine learning more tangible.

Inspired by my master's thesis, this tool has been used in educational settings to help students understand the fundamentals of artificial intelligence.

ai.label: AI & ML
ai.title: Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
ai.subtitle: Interest in intelligent systems
ai.description:
I'm deeply interested in how AI and machine learning can be made more accessible and understandable through thoughtful visualization and interface design.

My background in both technical implementation and design helps me create experiences that bridge the gap between complex AI concepts and intuitive user interfaces.

interactive.label: Interactive Art
interactive.title: Interactive Art & Creative Coding
interactive.subtitle: Exploring the intersection of art and technology
interactive.description:
I'm passionate about the creative potential of code and how it can be used to create interactive art experiences. I experiment with generative art, interactive installations, and creative visualizations that respond to user input or environmental data.

This interest influences my professional work by encouraging innovative approaches to design challenges and user interaction patterns.

music.label: Music
music.title: Music & Audio
music.subtitle: Passion for music and audio technology
music.description:
My interest in music extends to how it can be visualized and experienced through technology. I enjoy exploring the intersection of audio processing, visualization, and interactive design.

This passion has influenced projects like my audio visualizer and informs my approach to creating immersive, multisensory digital experiences.

space.label: Space
space.title: Space & Astronomy
space.subtitle: Fascination with cosmic exploration
space.description:
I'm fascinated by space exploration and astronomy, which inspires many of my design aesthetics and visualization projects. The cosmic theme you see throughout my portfolio reflects this interest.

I enjoy finding ways to represent astronomical data and concepts in interactive, accessible formats.
